appName: Chinese Input - Zhuyin & Pinyin (中文輸入)
displayName: Chinese Input - Zhuyin & Pinyin (中文輸入)
display_name: Chinese Input - Zhuyin & Pinyin (中文輸入)
display_long_description:
Chinese Input - Zhuyin & Pinyin is a Chinese input app for Meta Quest 2/3+ VR headsets. Three input methods: Zhuyin, Pinyin, and offline voice input for effortless Chinese input in VR.

**Three Input Methods**

Zhuyin (Bopomofo): MOE standard characters with standard zhuyin marking. Four-row symbol arrangement, traditional layout. Smart candidates from first symbol.

Pinyin: Simplified Chinese with QWERTY layout. Complete pinyin entries. Quick character selection.

Offline Voice: Voice-to-text—speak to input. Completely offline, local processing. Auto Traditional/Simplified conversion.

**Traditional/Simplified Conversion**

Bidirectional conversion, high accuracy. Auto conversion of results. Learning area for comparisons.

**Learning Area**

Zhuyin Display: View zhuyin for any text. Pinyin Display: View pinyin markings. Comparison: View Traditional/Simplified correspondence. Lookup: Find pronunciation and conversion.

**Smart Candidates**

Instant display from first symbol/pinyin. Partial matching support. Visual: exact (green) vs partial (blue) matches.

**Keyboard Layout**

Zhuyin: Four-row traditional layout. Pinyin: QWERTY layout. Function keys: voice, backspace, space, copy, search. VR-optimized touch controls.

**Use Cases**

VR social chat with voice input. In-game Chinese communication. VR content creation. Learning zhuyin/pinyin. Traditional/Simplified conversion.

**Privacy**

All processing local, no data collection. Offline voice recognition. No account required.
